tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LiteratureAnalysis (
    paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    authors VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    keywords TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE literature_articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publication_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE citation_records (
    citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    citing_article_id INT,
    cited_article_id INT,
    citation_date DATE,
    citation_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE citations (
  citation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  paper_id INT,
  cited_paper_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (paper_id) REFERENCES research_papers(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (cited_paper_id) REFERENCES research_papers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_papers (
	paper_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	paper_title TEXT,
	paper_abstract TEXT,
	paper_author TEXT,
	publish_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE literature_sources (
    source_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    source_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE research_topics (
    topic_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_articles (
    article_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    summary TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    topic_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE article_authors (
    author_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(100),
    affiliation VARCHAR(150)
)

CREATE TABLE article_citations (
    citation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    citing_article_id UUID,
    cited_article_id UUID,
    citation_date DATE
)
